titleStmt.title: The church's request to all her faithful sons and children that they would now pray for her, and stand by her, and help her what they can, and not forsake her in her desolate condition, and the dark time of popery that is coming upon her / written by Digby Bull ...
titleStmt.author: Bull, Digby.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by J. Whitlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
